dialogue.text: Well, well, well... look who decided to show up.
Mister Puzzles... We meet again.
Ah, Sailor Andriux... I see you brought your blue-haired maniac and his little fiends into this wasteland.
But don't think I'm outnumbered in this one match. I have one last trick up my sleeve...
One last trick? What the hell are you talking about--
What's up, bitches!!!
B-Beep?! (J... John...?!)
Ah, it seems you've forgotten... I'm not just some villain, I'm a mastermind.
What in the name of the moon are you talking about?!
You think you've won, don't you? That you've redeemed your little friends... Joaquin and Mickey?
Well, guess what? They weren't powerful enough to stop all of you.
So let us get this straight... You still have that diaper boy as your last pawn?
Precisely. John is my last puppet, my perfect weapon. But I'm not just stopping there.
You see, I've found the real key to my power while you were prancing around like little lambs... YouTube.
YouTube...?
Yes, that platform of endless reach, filled with millions of unsuspecting fools.
So that explains why all these YouTubers are killed without a single warning...
And you're planning to use YouTube to take over the world?! You're more evil than the Mad Doctor if I so say myself!
After all you've done to all of us? Boy, ya sure are a demential freak!
These guys are more than correct, Mister Perfection Man. YOU'RE A MANIPULATIVE BITCH!!!
Say all you want, but I have finally cracked the code to world domination... and you all got here too little too late.
The algorithm, the subscribers, the influence... I'll manipulate it all. Soon, I'll control the masses, and nothing will stop me.
Wait... What are you saying? I... I don't understand...
Of course you don't, John. You're just a pawn in my game. But soon, you'll see the truth.
The power of the internet is the future of everything. And said power will be more than enough to stop you all.
You're wrong, Puzzles. We won't let you use John like this. We'll stop your right here and now!
Try all you want. But in the end, I'll have the last laugh. And the world will be mine.
We'll see about that.
C'mon, BF! Let's show this bastard who's boss around here!
Beep! (Count me in!)
